course_title: Writing of Drama for the Stage I - STAGE DRAMA I

sections.comments: All CRWR Winter Term 1 (September-December) courses/sections will be held online. This particular course will run as a text-based asynchronous workshop on Canvas Thursday-Friday, with a synchronous play reading component on Collaborate Ultra. Play readings will be recorded for students who cannot attend in real time.

description: A workshop class in writing of drama for the stage. Studio work is required, and some plays may be given a live stage production in Brave New Play Rites (adjudication process involved).
